login.title: Sign In To Your Account
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to enjoy all features.
login.createAccountDescription: Add items to your wishlist, get personalized recommendations, track your orders

register.title: Register Your Account
register.subtitle: Complete the form below to create your account and start shopping faster.
register.agreeTerms: By creating an account, you agree to our:
register.consentProcessing: I consent to Herboil processing my personal data in order to send personalized marketing material in line with the consent form and the privacy policy.
register.consentPrivacy: By clicking "create account", I consent to the privacy policy.
register.haveAccountLink: ALREADY HAVE AN ACCOUNT? SIGN IN
